author: mirror
title: Page 3 girl 'sex text' secrets stolen in daring robbery: Rhian Sugden lashes out at 'scumbags'
text:
Rhian Sugden is afraid her sex secrets coupld be leaked (Photo: Instagram) Share Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Lingerie model Rhian Sugden is terrified that burglars could reveal her sex secrets after stealing a laptop containing private messages. 
The 30-year-old blonde was left seething after brazen raiders smashed their way into her Manchester home in the middle of the day. 
It is believed the gang made off with £5,000 worth of goods and her prized laptop, which contained messages, steamy snaps and videos. 
Rhian's sexting threatened to end presenter Vernon Kay's marriage to Tess Daly. She also had an affair with a Hollywood A-lister, which she has never named. Rhian Sugden was at the hairdressers when crooks broke into her house (Photo: formphotos.co.uk) Rhian has branded the theives scumbags (Photo: formphotos.co.uk) Rhian is engaged to ex Corrie star Oliver Mellor (Photo: XPOSUREPHOTOS.COM) Read More Chris Moyles' weight loss secret after losing five stone and transforming his life 
The busty blonde also had a brief relationship with Russell Brand but revealed on CBB they didn't "go all the way." She is now engaged to ex-Coronation Street star fiancé Oliver Mellor. 
Pals say the model is afraid the raiders will be able to access her computer and reveal intimate details of her life. 
A friend told the Daily Star the model was “struggling to come to terms” with the robbery. 
“She cannot get over the thought that strangers have been in her house. Her long-term worry is what might happen to her private pictures and messages. The pair at a recent theatre show (Photo: WENN.com) Rhian and Vernon Kay's texting threated to destroy his marriage to Tess Daly (Photo: Getty Images) 
“Rhian is a really down-to-earth, open person – they are among the qualities that make her so lovely. 
“But it doesn’t matter how open you are, you are still entitled to privacy. She is not certain she’ll ever feel safe to return to the house.” 
Greater Manchester Police are appealing for information about the raid. Like us on Facebook
